entry.title: Bitcoin Protocol Specification
entry.summary: In this email thread, Aaron Voisine shares a short description in code comments for breadwallet, which can be found on GitHub. The link to the specific section of the code is provided. Matt Whitlock then asks if anyone is working on a specification document for Satoshi's P2P protocol and expresses interest in understanding how blocks and transactions are communicated over the network. The email ends with a promotion for an open-source business process management suite. This email thread appears to have taken place on the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
